website_summaries.verdict: Pretty feathers that are effortless to put in and take out of hair, which makes them a good pick for temporary wear.
pros: Features multiple feathers on an attached clip that makes it easy to fix to hair
Has nice "flow," as the lengths are 12 inches to 14 inches
cons: Feathers are fragile, and prone to creasing and breaking when not handled carefully

customer_reviews.title: Lots of flow
customer_reviews.text: This was a good purchase. I think it fits my long hair well and it has good flow and I can't even feel it because it fits comfortably. I did have to modify the hair clip but overall this is a nice hair feather.
customer_reviews.author: Drkiller

customer_reviews.title: Breaks easily.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty but gets lost in your hair if you have a lot of hair, and it broke apart.
customer_reviews.author: Blippidydoo

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: This is so cute! I originally purchased this for a Halloween costume (Indian) but I like it so much, I wore it a couple of times during the summer!
customer_reviews.author: Rachelle

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just as pictured. Dainty & delicate feathers that arrived undamaged.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Nice But a Bit of a Challenge
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived quickly and was nice. The clip is a little difficult to get in your hair, but once it is in place it will stay in place. Getting it off without pulling a few hairs out...well I haven't been able to master that piece yet.
customer_reviews.author: Linda H Wiggs

customer_reviews.title: hard to fasten
customer_reviews.text: the feathers are crooked , bent - also the fastener is like a very stiff bobby pin and very difficult to put in your hair
customer_reviews.author: feather

customer_reviews.title: Excellent and good quality
customer_reviews.text: Was exactly what we wanted for my fathers braid .
customer_reviews.author: Dez Cole

customer_reviews.title: Proceed with caution
customer_reviews.text: This was advertised as a "roach clip" thinking i was getting something cool and retro. It ended up being a feather on a bobby pin
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: She says it looks great.
customer_reviews.text: My wife bought this to add some pizzazz to one of her costumes. She says it looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Nola

customer_reviews.title: Love my feathers!!
customer_reviews.text: I love it!! I had one like me this when I was 18 and when I saw this I just had to have it!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my Halloween costume/cosplay
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my Halloween costume/cosplay. Really good quality and I like that I can change the clip out with one that matches my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my needs. Bob upon could be a bit looser, it hurts to take it out.
customer_reviews.author: Eliza Coombs

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: The item is as advertised. The seller was a little rude when I was unable to cancel when the projected delivery date would be too late for my needs for which I stated my unhappiness. I am very happy with the product itself but will not buy from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Debbe Noonan

customer_reviews.title: Not a " Roach Clip " but Bobbie Pin
customer_reviews.text: The Feathers are nice, however, it's not a clip, it's a Bobbie pin. I'll just put it behind my ear, so as not to rip out as many hairs when taking it out.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Dubz

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: The description and picture are 100% accurate. Its just a bobby pin that has a loop that can be removed, i took it off the silver bobby pin and put it on a black one to match my hair. It was the same length as my hair so it really looked nice. My hair goes about six inches past my shoulder, maybe a little shorter.
customer_reviews.author: anon

customer_reviews.title: It looks so good with orange
customer_reviews.text: It looks so good with orange. I just love it long live the 60's. Those were wonderful years. Nice to see some of the things we loved are coming back.
customer_reviews.author: Mitzi   Osborn

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: I got this to go with my Halloween costume but after receiving it have found that I can wear it as a cute fashion accessory. It is delicate, as feathers are, so when not in use find a clip board to hang it on so that it stays well intact.
customer_reviews.author: Alichia

customer_reviews.title: As shown
customer_reviews.text: It really is exactly as depicted. Feather/beads on a bobby pin lol. Simple enough an got the job done. Can also be easily removed from its pin if you wish.
customer_reviews.author: Dizzy.Dreamer

customer_reviews.title: cute
customer_reviews.text: I like it. Good material and the feathers are actual feathers. Its better quality than i see in most stores these days. You can also take the bobby pin it comes with off and used one of your own, which is great if you want the bobby pin to blend in with the color of your hair. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Ariel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This was fun to wear with my costume. I could see it being worn for regular boho fashion.
customer_reviews.author: Lakewood

customer_reviews.title: cute and durable
customer_reviews.text: This item arrived quickly. I bought it for my daughter to wear with her Indian costume. It seems to be well made and worked great. I am pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: chall

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The feathers are great! They look so much better than the picture
customer_reviews.author: Hime

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like the feathers but the clip pulls my hair out.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Cost worthy and cute.
customer_reviews.text: Well made and packaged, came on time feathers and beading were intact love that its on a bobby pin replaced it with one of mine to match my hair. Would spend so much more to get this at a mall.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Love it: )
customer_reviews.text: I wear this hair piece alot and it adds uniqueness to outfits. Love it :)
customer_reviews.author: Krystal Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Don't Bother
customer_reviews.text: Not very well made. Feathers are crushed and I could not sell these at craft shows.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth L. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Does not stay in
customer_reviews.text: The pins are too large and I can not get them to stay in my daughters hair.
customer_reviews.author: Kim skardoutos

product_meta.title: Long Hippie Feather Hair Extension
product_meta.description: Gorgeous new feathered hippie hair extension.
feature_bullets: Overall Average Length is 12 - 14" on Average
We also have matching feather earrings available in our store
